name: One Night At Tingdoc's Pizza Place 2 The Animatronics Return
name_original: One Night At Tingdoc's Pizza Place 2 The Animatronics Return
description:
This takes place after One Night At Tingdoc's Pizza Place 1 and we are at another Tingdoc's Pizza House. But we are hired to watch this place since there were reports of robots moving so you have to watch for the night to keep a eye on the Robots #fangame #fnaf Credits to Everyone even Nintendo and ,Scratch_Memelord.

This is My second game.

Disclaimer: This is not to offend anyone or break The community guidelines, this is all just game.

Controls:

A - Left door

D - Right door

S - Cameras

How to play:

Tingdoc: He will be sitting in left hall sleeping then start moving towards your door. If see a sign in left hall camera, close it.

Codeingit Creeper: Same thing as Tingdoc but makes a weird noise when attacking the right door.

Codeingit: He will be in your office then start waking up.

When he fully woke, pull up the camera to make him fall asleep.

Codeingit1049: He be in the Game room and there a Game meter slowly draining. Click it to wind it up.

Codeingit Bear: He be in the right corner, asleep and then starts to attack your right door. If you hear him running, close the right door.
